titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3734) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201(a)(1) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1997.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-729, by Mr. Solomon.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 261.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 259 - 164 (Roll no. 381).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 281 - 137 (Roll no. 382).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/31/1996--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3734 (budget reconciliation).
